root.name: Super Robot Taisen GC
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of the anime series which are featured in the game. Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with (new).Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mazinkaiser (Anime OVA version; new) Shin Getter Robo vs. Neo Getter Robo Metal Armor Dragonar Blue Comet SPT Layzner Future Robo Daltanius Galactic Cyclone Braiger Galactic Gale Baxinger (new) Galactic Whirlwind Sasuraiger (new) Heavy Metal L-Gaim Invincible Robo Trider G7 Strongest Robo Daioja (new) Absolutely Invincible Raijin-Oh (new) Super Beast Machine God Dancougar Banpresto Originals (Original characters created for the game) Super Robot Taisen GC originated on the GameCube in 2004, but was later ported to the Xbox 360 and released as Super Robot Taisen XO.
